string-array.name: photography_questions
string-array.item: Name the device that a professional digital camera has that records information - ultimately creating an image. > Mirror, Film, ISO, Sensor > Sensor
What affects the amount of light that is captured in an image? \n(select all that apply) > Shutter Speed, Aperture, Shutter Release, White Balance > Shutter Speed, Aperture
What is the term most frequently used when a photographer measures and adjusts a camera\'s light exposure? > Stops, Points > Stops

List the types of cameras in order from LEFT to RIGHT? \n(select all that apply) > DSLR/"Compact/"Compact, DSLR/"Mirrorless/"Compact, Point and Shoot/"Mirrorless/"DSLR, None of the above > None of the above

resources.string: In this quiz, you will be tested on your knowledge on photography basics. \nClick the \"Start Quiz\" button below to begin. \nGood luck!
Read and answer each question. When finished, click the \"Submit\" button to check your score.
Name the device that a professional digital camera has that records information - ultimately creating an image.
What affects the amount of light that is captured in an image? \n(select all that apply)
Shutter Speed, Aperture, Shutter Release, White Balance
What is the term most frequently used when a photographer measures and adjusts a camera\'s light exposure?
List the types of cameras in order from LEFT to RIGHT? \n(select all that apply)
DSLR/"Compact/"Compact, DSLR/"Mirrorless/"Compact, Point and Shoot/"Mirrorless/"DSLR, None of the above
What does the \"SLR\" stand for in DSLR?
Congratulations on completing the Quiz! \n\nYour Final Score:
